channel.title: Getting your ear pierced - Any input?
channel.description:
Was contemplating on getting my ear pierced in the next few days. Only on the left ear and I most likely will just wear one of those black studs. Still unsure if it is the right decision.
Anyone think it looks good on guys anyway?

item.title: Getting your ear pierced - Any input?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Never even considered it myself. I don’t think it’s “bad” on a dude but I just can’t see myself doing it personally. If you think your ear is large enough go for it.

Read full topic
item.source: Getting your ear pierced - Any input?

item.title: Getting your ear pierced - Any input?
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

not many people can pull it off, most of them end up looking like douches

Read full topic
item.source: Getting your ear pierced - Any input?

item.title: Getting your ear pierced - Any input?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

TabbyKiller:

Go for it, it’ll stay open forever and doesn’t look weird with nothing in it if you decide you don’t like it. Just don’t get a stretcher, those things are fudgein’ disgusting.

Mine didn’t stay open forever. Mine closed in a few days after i took it out.
Then again, I didn’t have it in very long.

Read full topic
item.source: Getting your ear pierced - Any input?

item.description:
@Death_Style wrote:

don’t get those giant holes in the earlobe they look retarded idk wtf is wrong with people these days

item.title: Getting your ear pierced - Any input?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I had my ear pierced once.
Got it done free at wal-mart because I had a sterile earring (Sterile as in: clearly unopened and uncontaminated.)
Took it out like a week later because I didn’t like it.

Read full topic
